flawed_nl_solution:
Tom will be 30 in 5 years so now he is 30-5 = <<30-5=25>>25
2 years ago Tom was 25-2 = <<25-2=26>>26
At that time, Jared was twice as old as Tom so Jared was 26*2 = 52
Two years have since passed so Jared is now 52+2 = <<52+2=54>>54
#### 54

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 23, not 26. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
